data.message: I live in Lodi, CA., not as big as Seattle, but as I drive around town, I see homeless people everywhere! It breaks my heart! My husband, granddaughter & I give them food.....I just can't go out and eat, with a clear conscience, and not give them something to eat! If they need change, we give them what we have. But as they're are more & more homeless, I feel we need to do more! What you are doing is wonderful! Thank you for this generous idea! "And the greatest of these are Charity, (Love)." God Bless You All!  😇
